scripts.build: mkdir -p dist; npm run build:html; npm run build:app
scripts.build:html: cp src/index.html dist; cp -R vendor/pure-layout-email/css vendor/pure-layout-email/img dist
scripts.prodpostbuild:app: uglifyjs dist/index.js -m -c --output dist/index.min.js --source-map dist/index.min.js.map --source-map-root http://ocalhost:63342/uxebu/dist/index.html ; rm -f dist/index.js
